name: South African Milktart
instructions: Grease a 9" *deep* pie plate. In large bowl, mix butter and sugar until smooth; add egg yolks. Add flour, baking powder, salt, vanilla and milk; mix.
In separate bowl, whip egg whites until stiff, then fold into batter. Pour into pie plate and sprinkle with cinnamon sugar.

Bake for 25 min. in preheated oven, then reduce temperature to 325 degrees. Continue to bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the center is set when the pie is jiggled. Refrigerate and serve cold (although you may try serving hot).
